text:
Hey all - I was wondering if anybody here knows the source for HubSpot adding the <div id="site-wrapper"></div> just after the body tags of my html. I hardcoded a new page for a client to work around the auto-bootstrap and it is messing with their default mobile menu. HubSpot seems to be generating the #site-wrapper tag twice and is causing the body to be pushed out twice as far when the mobile menu opens up.

I assume HubSpot is injecting this via some scripting but I am not certain - any thoughts would be appreciated!
